text: Tigers' Joe Jimenez ends game with flop, then flurry of strikeouts Young Tigers reliever worked himself into and then out of jam in ninth inning Monday against Braves Post to Facebook Tigers' Joe Jimenez ends game with flop, then flurry of strikeouts Young Tigers reliever worked himself into and then out of jam in ninth inning Monday against Braves  //on.freep.com/2mxWeP0   Join the Conversation To   Tigers' Joe Jimenez ends game with flop, then flurry of strikeouts Anthony Fenech , Detroit Free Press 7:28   Facebook Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Tigers leftfielder Justin Upton (8) and shortstop Jose Iglesias (1) congratulate each other after they combined on a tipped ball catch during the fourth inning of the Tigers' 10-7 exhibition win Monday in Lakeland, Fla. Reinhold Matay USA TODAY Sports Braves pitcher R.A. Dickey (19) throws a pitch during the first inning of the Tigers' 10-7 exhibition win Monday in Lakeland, Fla. Reinhold Matay USA TODAY Sports Tigers pitcher Jordan Zimmermann (27) throws a pitch during the first inning of the Tigers' 10-7 exhibition win Monday in Lakeland, Fla. Reinhold Matay USA TODAY Sports Tigers shortstop Jose Iglesias (left) looks on as Braves shortstop Dansby Swanson (right) slid safely into second base on a grounder to first base during the first inning of the Tigers' 10-7 exhibition win Monday in Lakeland, Fla. Reinhold Matay USA TODAY Sports Tigers rightfielder Mike Gerber (75) signs autographs before the Tigers' 10-7 exhibition win Monday in Lakeland, Fla. Reinhold Matay USA TODAY Sports Nine-year-old Ava Hudge sings the national anthem before the first inning of the Tigers' 10-7 exhibition win Monday in Lakeland, Fla. Reinhold Matay USA TODAY Sports Tigers first baseman Miguel Cabrera (24) slides into second base as Braves second baseman Travis Demeritte (81) waits on the ball during the third inning of the Tigers' 10-7 exhibition win Monday in Lakeland, Fla. Reinhold Matay USA TODAY Sports Tigers pitcher Anibal Sanchez (19) throws a pitch during the third inning of the Tigers' 10-7 exhibition win Monday in Lakeland, Fla. Reinhold Matay USA TODAY Sports Tigers shortstop Jose Iglesias (1) dives to field a grounder during the first inning of the Tigers' 10-7 exhibition win Monday in Lakeland, Fla. Reinhold Matay USA TODAY Sports Tigers second baseman Ian Kinsler (3) fields the ball at second base but Braves first baseman Freddie Freeman (5) slides in safely during the first inning of the Tigers' 10-7 exhibition win Monday in Lakeland, Fla. Reinhold Matay USA TODAY Sports Tigers shortstop Jose Iglesias (1) throws to second after making a diving infield stop during the first inning of the Tigers' 10-7 exhibition win Monday in Lakeland, Fla. Reinhold Matay USA TODAY Sports Braves catcher Kurt Suzuki (right) is caught sliding into second base by Tigers shortstop Dixon Machado (left) during the first inning of the Tigers' 10-7 exhibition win Monday in Lakeland, Fla.
